description: Explore the lair and first two levels of Banjo-Kazooie with the DK Crew, and collect some things along the way.
A Diddy Kong Racing -esque world with a hub map, 6 car challenges, and a couple bonuses to be found. The 6th and final race is unlocked by beating the other 5.
A linear hack with 5 levels, tonnes of platform challenges and barrels of fun.
Begin the game with Lanky Kong
Practice ROM for Donkey Kong 64 that assists with practising the game for speedrunning.
Change up where the loading zones take you, where moves are purchased and even the difficulty of the game!
Use D-Pad Left/Right to instantly tag to the previous/next Kong in the rotation.
